title: Marriage For Fake Love -Our Marriage Is Strategic, But That Won't Stop My Handsome Ceo From Training Me In Bed-
alternative_title: LOVECHEEK USOKOIMARIAGE KEIYAKUKEKKON DESUGA COOLSHACHO NI SEITEKINI SHITSUKERARETEMASU ; Uso Koi Marriage - Keiyaku Kekkon desuga Cool Shachou ni (Seiteki ni) Shitsuke Keraretemasu ; 사장님과의 계약 결혼 ; 嘘恋マリッジ～契約結婚ですがクール社長に（性的に）躾けられてます～
status: LOVECHEEK USOKOIMARIAGE KEIYAKUKEKKON DESUGA COOLSHACHO NI SEITEKINI SHITSUKERARETEMASU ; Uso Koi Marriage - Keiyaku Kekkon desuga Cool Shachou ni (Seiteki ni) Shitsuke Keraretemasu ; 사장님과의 계약 결혼 ; 嘘恋マリッジ～契約結婚ですがクール社長に（性的に）躾けられてます～
description:
Description :
        Yui has zero experience in the love department, causing her mother to worry about her ever getting married.The 25?year?old's not concerned with marriage though, as she's living out her fantasy, shipping her company's future CEO and the top sale rep!There's even a rumor that the two men are dating in real life.Enjoying her daily fantasies is one thing, but what will happen when she's caught unknowingly alone in a room with them!?In order to protect their secret and love, and to satisfy her mother, Yui agrees to marry Shinya in a fake wedding...She's shocked, though, when Shinya makes a real move on her on their fake wedding night...!He's caressing her body, driving her wild...!!This is a story about the newlywed life between an aggressive CEO and male romance?loving woman with her head in the clouds.+
